description: Akiha Yakitaka is the father of http://anidb.net/ch33062 [Akiha Rumiho] (http://anidb.net/ch23265 [Faris Nyan-Nyan]). His family is the owner of most of the land making up http://anidb.net/t2927 [Akihabara], and as such has been instrumental in giving the district its character.
name: Akiha Yukitaka
